Module org.cruk.clarity.api.recorder
Package org.cruk.clarity.api.record

Class ClarityAPIRecordingAspect

java.lang.Object
org.cruk.clarity.api.record.ClarityAPIRecordingAspect
@Component("clarityRecordingAspect") public class ClarityAPIRecordingAspect extends Object
Aspect for recording server exchanges with a real Clarity server as XML files to a directory on disk.

    • isRecordSearchesWithoutResults

      public boolean isRecordSearchesWithoutResults()
      Whether to record a search that returns no results. The playback aspect can be set up to ignore missing search results and just return nothing from the call rather than requiring the search file is present. This is the other side of that: should we write a search file if the search has returned nothing.
      Returns:
      Whether to record searches that brought back zero results or not.
      Since:
      2.31.6
      See Also:
      • ClarityAPIPlaybackAspect.isFailOnMissingSearch()

    • setRecordSearchesWithoutResults

      public void setRecordSearchesWithoutResults(boolean recordSearchesWithoutResults)
      Set whether to record a search with zero results or not.
      Parameters:
      recordSearchesWithoutResults - true to save a search regardless of the results, false to not save when there are no results.
      Since:
      2.31.6

    • doLoad

      public Object doLoad(org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint pjp) throws Throwable
      Join point around the Clarity client's load() and retrieve() methods. Simply marshalls the object that has come back from the Clarity server to a file named with the required class's short name (no package) plus either its LIMS id (if there is one) or the identifier given at the end of the path of the URI.
      Parameters:
      pjp - The join point.
      Returns:
      The entity returned from the server.
      Throws:
      Throwable - if there is anything fails.

    • doLoadAll

      public Object doLoadAll(org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint pjp) throws Throwable
      Join point around the Clarity client's loadAll() method. Marshals all the objects returned from the server to files on disk, as per doLoad().
      Parameters:
      pjp - The join point.
      Returns:
      The entities returned from the server.
      Throws:
      Throwable - if there is anything fails.
      See Also:
      • doLoad(ProceedingJoinPoint)

    • doFind

      public <E extends Locatable> List<LimsLink<E>> doFind(org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint pjp) throws Throwable
      Join point around the Clarity client's find() method. Runs the search and records the search terms and results in a file in the search directory.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of entity being searched for.
      Parameters:
      pjp - The join point.
      Returns:
      The result of the search (a list of links).
      Throws:
      Throwable - if there is an error invoking the underlying method.

    • doList

      public <E extends Locatable, L extends LimsLink<E>, BH extends Batch<L>> List<L> doList(org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint pjp) throws Throwable
      Join point around the listAll and listSome methods that recreate the Batch object that holds the list of links to the real things and writes that list to an XML file in the messages directory.

      Only one list is saved for each type, so if there are multiple calls to either list method in the calling code, the final file will be the latest list. It is envisaged that most of the time, each thing will be only listed once so this shouldn't in practice be an issue.

      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of entity to list.
      L - The type of link to the entity returned from the API.
      BH - The batch class that is used to hold the links returned from the API.
      Parameters:
      pjp - The join point.
      Returns:
      The result of the search (a list of links).
      Throws:
      Throwable - if there is an error invoking the underlying method.

    • limsIdFromUri

      public static String limsIdFromUri(Class<?> clazz, String uri)
      Shared method to get the LIMS id out of a URI, public to let the playback aspect use it. Removes trailing sections on the URI from classes like Demux and StepDetails.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The type of entity to obtain the LIMS id for.
      uri - The URI in string form.
      Returns:
      The (single) LIMS id from the URI.

    • limsIdFromObject

      public static String limsIdFromObject(Object thing)
      Shared method to get the LIMS id from an object, which must at least implement Locatable.
      Parameters:
      thing - The entity to get an id for.
      Returns:
      The LIMS id for the object.
